plugins.name: html-to-pdf
plugins.description: Convert HTML files to PDF or PNG format with multiple rendering options. Supports multi-page PDFs, single-page long-image PDFs, background colors, and Chinese/CJK characters.

plugins.name: markdown-to-pdf
plugins.description: Convert Markdown files to professional PDF presentations using Marp. Supports multiple themes, code syntax highlighting, math equations, and Chinese/CJK characters.

plugins.name: team-analytics
plugins.description: Analyze team's git commit history across all repositories for activity, performance, and working areas per developer. Includes repository discovery, contribution analysis, and team velocity metrics.

plugins.name: specialized-agents
plugins.description: Collection of specialized AI agents for various roles including architects, engineers, project managers, analysts, and a complete specification workflow system with orchestrator, planner, analyst, developer, reviewer, validator, and tester agents.

plugins.name: custom-statusline
plugins.description: Enhanced status line displaying model info, project/directory, git branch and status, token usage metrics, cost estimates, and system load with real-time updates.

plugins.name: gemini-image-generator
plugins.description: Generate images using Google Gemini models (2.0 Flash & 3.0 Pro). Create visuals, graphics, and artwork for marketing materials, social media, banners, and promotional content.
